title: How to find photographers in Dhaka - Quora

response.answer_text: You can search for photographers in Dhaka on Facebook. You will get a list of photographers with their contact details i.e. Phone no and Address. You can visit the following link: Photographers in Dhaka, Bangladesh Hope this will help you. If you have more queries then you can contact me. THANKS.
It is not mentioned that which kind of photographer is needed.Still photographers will be found on Facebook.Photographers open Facebook pages to run their photography business.

The best way to find photographers in Dhaka is to go to BD Photographers - Find A Photographer in Bangladesh Which is the first online platform for photographers in Bangladesh to connect clients with qualified photographers. Thanks.
